1.title: #IssaSideChick
1.plot: Kecia and Drew's chill day turns to chaos when Drew's side chick decides to tag him in a post on Instagram.

2.title: #IssaFight
2.plot: Kecia demands Drew take her to his side chick Dallas' house for some much-needed answers. Drew's hot temper gets him into a situation.

3.title: #IssaPopUp
3.plot: Drew finally pops up on Dallas after weeks of her chasing him down; he then pops up on Taylor to find out what's up with Kecia - catching Taylor post compromising position. Meech pops up on Dallas on her way to work - despite the restraining order she has on him.

4.title: #IssaProblem
4.plot: Drew decides to come home without first discussing it with Kecia, causing a major blow-up. Taylor gives Mark what he's been waiting for but realizes she's not any closer to getting what she's been waiting for. Dallas worries there's a high probability her abusive ex Meech is the father of her unborn baby.

5.title: #IssaSolution
5.plot: Drew works his way out of the dog house with Kecia with good deeds. Dallas decides to get an abortion but needs Drew to take her.

6.title: #IssaRevelation
6.plot: Taylor figures out why Mark doesn't have time for a relationship- with her. Kecia makes yet another heartbreaking discovery about Drew and Dallas. Meech learns what Dallas is up to and who she's up to it with.

locations: New York City, New York, USA::(Brooklyn NY)
imdb.plot outline: Drew's world is turned upside down with the news that his side chick Dallas may be pregnant with his fourth kid; making her potential baby mama #3. Dealing with Dallas won't be easy, especially with her sharing all their business with her nosy cousin Alicia and the presence of her abusive ex, Meech who can't seem to stop stalking her. Can live-in girlfriend, Kecia, and baby mama #2 forgive Drew and find a way to make their family work? Drew receives conflicting advice from closest friends Clinton and Darius but whose insight will set him straight? Luckily for Drew, Kecia and Baby Mama #1 are close and Taylor (reluctantly) advises on their relationship - even though she hasn't been in one of her own since they broke up. Watch from each parent's POV to see if they can manage to co-exist for the sake of the kids.
imdb.title: Baby Mama Drama
plot: "FOUR kids & THREE women share just ONE baby daddy which makes for a whole LOTTA DRAMA!"

Drew's world is turned upside down with the news that his side chick Dallas may be pregnant with his fourth kid; making her potential baby mama #3. Dealing with Dallas won't be easy, especially with her sharing all their business with her nosy cousin Alicia and the presence of her abusive ex, Meech who can't seem to stop stalking her. Can live-in girlfriend, Kecia, and baby mama #2 forgive Drew and find a way to make their family work? Drew receives conflicting advice from closest friends Clinton and Darius but whose insight will set him straight? Luckily for Drew, Kecia and Baby Mama #1 are close and Taylor (reluctantly) advises on their relationship - even though she hasn't been in one of her own since they broke up. Watch from each parent's POV to see if they can manage to co-exist for the sake of the kids.::Bella Brown
